section_1.title_1: What is a TourCoin and how does it work?
section_1.text_1_1: TourCoin is a token on the decentralized Binance Smart Chain (BSC), specifically designed for the tourism industry. It is a type of digital currency that revolutionizes your travel experiences. Driven by blockchain technology and supported by the robust Binance network, it is used for purchases, payments, and value storage.
section_1.text_1_2: TourCoin gives you the freedom to explore the world in a unique and secure way.
section_1.text_2_1: Users can acquire TourCoin through cryptocurrency exchanges or directly from the PancakeSwap platform. Once acquired, TourCoin are stored in a digital wallet such as MetaMask.
section_1.text_2_2: By using TourCoin, travelers can enjoy an innovative approach to making payments and transactions in the tourism industry, providing a smoother and more rewarding experience. Travel, smile, and pay with TourCoin. Happiness is found in every TourCoin you own.

section_2.p_1: TourCoin offers you the best benefits

card_1.title: Tokenization of Tangible Assets
card_1.text: Our company tokenizes tangible assets such as properties, tourism services, and commercial establishments. This allows investors to access investments in the thriving tourism sector in Celso Ramos, Brazil, in a more accessible and diversified way.

card_2.title: Transparency
card_2.text: Security tokens are issued on a blockchain, providing a public ledger. This ensures transparency in token management and allows investors to easily audit transactions and share issuances.

card_3.title: Appreciation
card_3.text: The growing demand for TourCoin in the tourism sector may result in potential appreciation of the same, offering attractive investment opportunities.

card_4.title: Borderless Travel
card_4.text: Traveling has never been easier! TourCoin eliminates barriers in international payments, allowing you to enjoy your travels without worrying about exchange rates and bank fees.

card_5.title: Discounts
card_5.text: Simply load your TourCoin into your digital wallet and unlock a wide range of travel experiences. Use your coins with our partnerships and enjoy exclusive discounts.

card_6.title: Voting Rights and Dividends
card_6.text: Our security tokens can be designed to grant investors voting rights and dividends, similar to common stocks. This gives investors an active role in business decisions and potential regular income streams.

section_6.text_1: Download the recommended wallet MetaMask for security and easy management of TourCoin. We suggest downloading the MetaMask wallet. This digital wallet gives you full control over your assets and facilitates transactions. Below, you will find a video on how to install MetaMask.
section_6.text_2: Now that you have your MetaMask wallet, it's time to acquire TourCoin. We use PancakeSwap, a secure and efficient platform for exchanging cryptocurrencies. Below, we show you step by step how to buy TourCoin on PancakeSwap.
